title: Server Down?!
body: first it is like unable to connect to chat server. then i restarted cilent again,what is going on with log in. it says it is logging on and next.. Unable to connect to server. It is what its looks likee

replies.body: Cannot log in, same window comes up. When it logs me in after trying 473628976 times, it doesn't connect the chat, and I have to do it manually, and it doesn't always connect. When I try to start a match it lets me into the room, I can decide my champ and everything, and after it doesn't load the loading match page. And "unable to connect to the server" comes up. "Try to check the firewall etc" which I never had on. So now I have 10 minutes of leaverbuster on me, for no reason. This is so utterly annoying. I've been trying to play all day and this doesn't seem to have an end. So frustrating!

I know right?  such bullshiiiiett. Even if they come up with a BS reason later at least approach the problem faster.
